name: ArnooEUSmarthome
0:
”Alexa,turn on plug”
”Alexa,turn off plug”
”Alexa,turn on reading”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Do you need an extra pair of hands to help you with tasks like getting your home ready for your party? The playlist needs to be set up and the right lighting selected to set the mood, but you’re still cooking dinner? Have you ever wished you could turn on the lights at night when you come home with your arms full of groceries?

Life just got easier, When using the Arnoo EU smart home skill , you will have the flexibility and convenience of voice control.

It’s easy to get started. Simply tap the “Enable” button in the Alexa App to link your Arnoo EU smart home skill and say, “Alexa, discover devices” 

With the Arnoo application, you can add a device, create lighting scenes or create custom room settings.
Add connected devices such as: bulbs, outlets, dimmers, switches and security system
Create custom mood or event scenes such as: Relax, Party, Dinner, Watch TV, etc.
Create Rooms for group control such as: Bedroom, Kitchen, Family Room, etc.

After adding a new device, or creating a Scene or Room, simply ask “Alexa, discover devices”.

Here are some examples of voice control commands for your smart home devices; as simple as 3 easy steps:
1. Discover device
2. Set
3. Use
Note: Currently the Arnoo EU smart home Skill for Alexa can be used to control Arnoo EU Smart home smart bulbs, switches, dimmers, outlets and sensors. Some products may need the Arnoo EU Smart home gateway to act as a bridge. For more compatible devices please visit www.leedarson.com or contact your sales team.
Supported Phrases :
Alexa, dim device 50%
Alexa, set the device to 50%
Alexa, set the device to color
Alexa, set the device warmer/softer
Alexa, set the device cooler/whiter
Alexa, turn on device
Alexa, turn off device
Alexa, set the security hub to stay mode
Alexa, set the security hub to away mode
